item.title: Illegal sand mining continues in Raichur; 37 cases booked in 19 days
item.description:
<![CDATA[Top News Of The Day
Pic: The extraction of sand from Krishna and Tungabhadra rivers is widespread across several taluks in RaichurRaichur: Illegal sand mining continues unabated across Raichur district, with police registering 37 cases from Jan 1-19. Devdurg taluk has emerged as the worst-affected area, accounting for 21 of those registered cases.There are widespread allegations that political functionaries and a section of the police force are hand-in-glove in allowing this menace to con...]]>
item.author: Chamaraj Savadi
